model-value.desc: Model of the component defining current panel name; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:modelValue' event) OR use v-model directive

vertical.description: Use vertical design (tabs one on top of each other rather than one next to the other horizontally)
vertical.description_zh: 使用垂直设计（标签一个接一个，而不是水平挨着另一个）

outside-arrows.description: Reserve space for arrows to place them on each side of the tabs (the arrows fade when inactive)
outside-arrows.description_zh: 为箭头预留空间，以便将它们放置在选项卡的每一侧（箭头在非活动状态时会淡化）

mobile-arrows.description: Force display of arrows (if needed) on mobile
mobile-arrows.description_zh: 在移动设备上强制显示箭头（如果需要）

align.description: Horizontal alignment the tabs within the tabs container
align.description_zh: 水平对齐选项卡容器中的选项卡

breakpoint.description: Breakpoint (in pixels) of tabs container width at which the tabs automatically turn to a justify alignment
breakpoint.description_zh: 制表符容器宽度的断点（以像素为单位），制表符自动变为对齐方式

active-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
active-color.desc: The color to be attributed to the indicator (the underline) of the active tab
active-color.description_zh: 类星体调色板中组件的颜色名称

active-bg-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
active-bg-color.desc: The color to be attributed to the indicator (the underline) of the active tab
active-bg-color.description_zh: 类星体调色板中组件的颜色名称

indicator-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
indicator-color.desc: The color to be attributed to the indicator (the underline) of the active tab
indicator-color.description_zh: 类星体调色板中组件的颜色名称

content-class.description: Class definitions to be attributed to the content wrapper
content-class.description_zh: 要归因于内容包装器的类定义

active-class.description: The class to be set on the active tab
active-class.description_zh: 要在活动选项卡上设置的类

left-icon.description: The name of an icon to replace the default arrow used to scroll through the tabs to the left, when the tabs extend past the width of the tabs container
left-icon.description_zh: 图标的名称，用于替换用于在选项卡向左滚动的默认箭头，当选项卡延伸到选项卡容器的宽度时

right-icon.description: The name of an icon to replace the default arrow used to scroll through the tabs to the right, when the tabs extend past the width of the tabs container
right-icon.description_zh: 用于替换默认箭头的图标名称，当选项卡延伸到选项卡容器的宽度时，用于向右滚动选项卡

stretch.description: When used on flexbox parent, tabs will stretch to parent's height
stretch.description_zh: 在 flexbox 父级上使用时，选项卡将拉伸到父级的高度

shrink.description: By default, QTabs is set to grow to the available space; However, you can reverse that with this prop; Useful (and required) when placing the component in a QToolbar
shrink.description_zh: 默认情况下，QTabs 设置为增长到可用空间;但是，您可以使用此道具将其逆转;将组件放置在 QToolbar 中时有用（也是必需的）

switch-indicator.description: Switches the indicator position (on left of tab for vertical mode or above the tab for default horizontal mode)
switch-indicator.description_zh: 切换指示器位置（垂直模式在选项卡左侧，默认水平模式在选项卡上方）

narrow-indicator.description: Allows the indicator to be the same width as the tab's content (text or icon), instead of the whole width of the tab
narrow-indicator.description_zh: 允许指示器的宽度与选项卡的内容（文本或图标）相同，而不是选项卡的整个宽度

inline-label.description: Allows the text to be inline with the icon, should one be used
inline-label.description_zh: 允许文本与图标内联（如果使用图标）

no-caps.description: Turns off capitalizing all letters within the tab (which is the default)
no-caps.description_zh: 关闭选项卡内所有字母的大写（这是默认设置）
